channel.title: How can i add a new Custom Item
channel.description: Hey everyone. I'm curious as to how i would go about adding a new item into the game. I edited all the angles of the sprites for the item. Anyone care to leave an explanation on how i might go about doing this. Thanks everyone.

item.title: How can i add a new Custom Item
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

ItemWieldableDef.xml, ItemsDef.xml, Items.rscd, Animations.rscd

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add a new Custom Item
